description:
We are introduced to our heroes when Bamboo-Lee meets Dah-Lin and Slo-Lee in their attempt to escape from Ratco trappers, whom we come to know as Rats 1, 2 and 3. Our heroes are rescued by a pink dragon called Ai-Ai who takes them to her master`s cave up in the mountains. Her master, No-How, is a wise old sage, determined to save the world`s environment and animals from destruction by the evil Ratco Company. He offers the Bamboo Bears an exciting mission to travel the world and save endangered animal species.
Source: bcdb.com
